# Creating an App for Face-Painting in AR

**Sample Code**

Combine RealityKit’s face detection with PencilKit to implement virtual face-painting.

## Overview



## Configure the Sample Code Project

This project requires an iPhone or iPad running iOS 15 or iPadOS 15. It doesn’t support running in Simulator.

## Body and face tracking

- **Occluding virtual content with people**: Cover your app’s virtual content with people that ARKit perceives in the camera feed.
- **BodyTrackingComponent**: A component for tracking people in an AR session.
- **BodyTrackedEntity**: An entity used to animate a virtual character in an AR scene by tracking a real person.
- **HasBodyTracking**: An interface that enables the animation of a virtual character by tracking a real person in AR.
